SSA Agricultural Potential (Documentation) Section 1 Data Sources

SSA Agricultural Potential (Documentation) BACOU, Melanie for BMGF Last updated on 2017-07-14. DO NOT USE OR CITE Section 1 Data Sources Existing sources of hi-res spatial covariates (tested over Ghana). ESA LULC grids are combined with IUCN WDPA protected areas to create areas of low/high crop suitability. MODIS C6 dekadal NDVI is summarized over a 10-year period (2005-2015).
